doc.title: Charlie Applebee
doc.plot: Charlie Applebee is a man on a mission. He leaves home with duct tape covering his shirt pocket, protecting something that he calls 'very important.' His goal is to purchase a bus ticket and deliver the very important item to its destination. When Charlie realizes that he is just short of the amount necessary to buy his ticket, that is where he encounters a fellow traveler who is drawn to Charlie's innocence and kind disposition. This is when the real drama develops.
